content.html: I know that I'll be comfortable blogging more once I can control who can see what I post. Like I do want to write about things like my move, new job, etc. But I don't want that indexed by the Internet Archive, lol. Probably should just spec that out. The way I want it to work would be a bit similar to how Facebook's lists and visibility—being able to set one to posts and moving people in and out of them.
